group.heading: Y H D I S T Ä N Y T
group.text: Tervetuloa Shareazaan! Sinä et ole tällä hetkellä yhteydessä mihinkään p2p verkkoon.
You are not currently connected to any peer to peer networks.

group.heading: E T S I S H A R E A Z A L L A
group.text: downloading a new file or torrent.
group.heading: P Ä I V I T Y S H U O M A U T U S
V A R O I T U S - S I N U T O N P A L O M U U R I T E T T U
K U S T O M O I S H A R E A Z A A
group.text: Shareaza has detected that you are behind a NAT router or firewall, and are unable to receive connections from the Internet.

group.heading: O M A T L A T A U K S E T
group.text: Shareaza has detected that you are behind a NAT router or firewall, and are unable to receive TCP connections from the Internet.
This may cause poor download performance.

group.heading: K A U K O O H J A U S O N K Ä Y T Ö S S Ä
group.text: Shareaza has detected that you are behind a NAT router or firewall, and are unable to receive UDP messages from the Internet.
This may cause poor search performance.

document.name: CGeneralSettingsGroup
document.title: Yleiset
document.text: Tervetuloa Shareazan Asetus Manageriin
The Shareaza Settings Manager allows advanced users to completely customise how Shareaza works. The settings in the
Yleiset
alue joka liittyy käyttö kokemukseen.
Yleiset käyttöliitymän asetukset kuten työkaluvihjeet, pienennys käyttäytyminen, formaattien määrä, kyselyt, jne.
Kirjaston näyttö ja managerointi, ja tiedostojen avaus.
Missä ja milloin käyttää sisään rakennettuaShareazan Media Keskusta.
Sinun profiilisi, chat ja pikaviesti asetukset.
IRC chatroom visual appearance and connection settings.
Integroi Shareaza sinun nettiselaimeesi hyväksyäksesi p2p linkkejä ja ladata sisältöä.

document.name: CInternetSettingsGroup
document.title: Internet
document.text: Tervetuloa Shareazan Asetus Manageriin
The Shareaza Settings Manager allows advanced users to completely customise how Shareaza works. The settings in the
Internet
alue joka kontrolloi kuinka Shareaza käyttäytyy toisien koneiden kanssa jaetuissa p2p verkoissa.
Internet yhteytesi nopeus ja toimivuus.
Latauksen tuotos, ajastus, varmistus, aikakatkaisut ja managerointi.
Lähetys kyky, jonotus, estäminen, aikakatkaisut ja erikois pyynnöt.
Aseta mahdollisuus kontrolloida Shareazaa nettiselaimellasi.

document.name: CBrowseHostProfile.2
document.text: Jaetut tiedostot

document.name: DownloadHelp.Select
document.text: Lataus Alue
This is where files currently being downloaded are displayed. You can view individual sources by expanding each file with the small + on the left.
Drag'n'Drop downloads higher in the list for priority, or onto Download Group tabs for better organisation (in Power Mode).
You can also use this command to get help information on a specific download. Simply select a download and choose this Help command again.

document.name: DownloadHelp.Seeding
document.text: This Torrent is Seeding
Shareaza has verified this complete download, and is actively sharing it with other downloaders through BitTorrent. Please share at least 100%.

document.name: DownloadHelp.Completed
document.text: Tämä lataus on valmis
Shareaza has finished downloading this file, and has verified that it is 100% correct. It has also moved the file to your downloads folder.

document.name: DownloadHelp.Moving
document.text: Tätä latausta siirretään
Shareaza has finished downloading this file, and has verified that it is correct. It is currently being moved and/or unpacked to your downloads folder.

document.name: DownloadHelp.Paused
document.text: Tämä lataus on pysäytetty
You have paused this download. If you want it to resume downloading, you can click the '
Palaa Lataukseen
komentoa.

document.name: DownloadHelp.DiskFull
document.text: Levy on täynnä

Shareaza has paused this download automatically because the hard disk appears to be full, or the download file cannot be written to. If you wish to continue downloading, please free some space on your hard disk and/or check to make sure the incomplete file folder is accessible, and then resume the download.

document.name: DownloadHelp.Verifying
document.text: Tätä latausta ollaan varmistamassa
This download has finished, and Shareaza is now checking it to ensure that it is exactly the same as the original file. If any damaged parts are found, Shareaza will repair them automatically.

document.name: DownloadHelp.Downloading
document.text: Tämä lataus on aktiivinen!
This download is currently in progress. If it is downloading too slowly, you could try searching the network for more sources with the '
Etsi Lisää Lähteitä
' command. If the speed does not improve it may be due to limited upload speeds of the users you are downloading from. Download speed usually increases over time.

document.name: DownloadHelp.Pending
document.text: Tämä lataus on Pyynnössä

This download is waiting for someone to start uploading. Shareaza is ready to start downloading this file, but no-one is sending it at the moment. You are probably waiting in other user's queues, and the download may start transferring at any time. You can examine the individual sources to see each queue you are waiting in. If you are sharing files yourself, it may improve the chances of a download transfer starting quickly.

document.name: DownloadHelp.Queued
document.text: Tämä lataus on jonossa

This download is waiting for some of your other downloads to complete. Your download settings limit the number of downloads which may be active at any given time, to ensure that each download gets a good share of the available bandwidth. You can change these settings via Tools, Shareaza Settings. Alternatively, you may manually start this download with the resume command.

document.name: DownloadHelp.Searching
document.text: Tämä lataus on Hakee

There are no known sources for this download, so Shareaza is searching all connected P2P networks for new sources. Once sources are found, the download will start automatically. Shareaza searches for sources automatically, however you can speed up the process using the
Etsi Lisää Lähteitä
komennolla.

Unfortunately in many cases there may be no users online who have the file you are looking for. The only course of action here is to wait for someone to come online, or cancel it and try to find a similar file which is more widely available.

document.name: DownloadHelp.Creating
document.text: Tätä latausta luodaan
Shareaza is pre-allocating a file in which to store this download, to save time later.

document.name: DownloadHelp.Tracker
document.text: BitTorrent Jäjitin Alhaalla
The BitTorrent tracker server for this download appears to be down or malfunctioning. Shareaza is unable to contact it to receive a list of peers.

document.name: UploadHelp
document.text: Lähetykset Alue
This is where queues and uploads are displayed. You can expand each queue with the small + on the left, and filter what is displayed with the button on the right of the window's toolbar.

document.name: GeneralHelp.DiskSpace
document.text: Vähäinen kovalevy tila
Vapaa kovalevy tila yhdellä tai monella kovalevyllä joita Shareaza käyttää on vähissä.

You should always attempt to keep a reasonable amount of disk space free. Programs can become unstable if the drives become full, and temporary files may be lost. You should run a disk clean-up, delete unwanted files, or uninstall software you no longer need.

document.name: GeneralHelp.DiskWriteFail
document.text: Tarvittava kansio ei ole kirjoitettavissa
Levy tai kansio mitä Shareaza käyttää ei voida kirjoittaa.
A network drive may have been disconnected, or you may not have write permission to a selected directory. Please check directories and permissions, or change the temporary files location.

document.name: GeneralHelp.ConnectionFail
document.text: Internet yhteys on hvitetty
Windows raportoi ett internet yhteytt ei ole saatavilla.
It is likely that a modem or router has dropped, meaning the internet cannot be accessed. You may need to manually re-connect or reset your connection.
Shareaza on pysyttnyt yhdistys yritykset jotta kaikkia kyttji jotka ovat vlimuistissa ei hukattaisi.

document.name: GeneralHelp.AdultFilter
document.text: Aikuisviihde suodatus on pll
Please note that (as with any automated filter) it may not be 100% effective at screening content. It is designed simply to filter out excess unwanted results, rather than as a 100% safe block.
Lasten internetin kytt (mukaan lukien P2P tiedoston jako) tulisi aina olla vanhemman valvonnassa.

document.name: GeneralHelp.BadTorrentEncoding
document.text: Tm torrentti nytt sisltv koodaus virheen

Windows has reported a translation fault while decoding text in this torrent. It is possible that the torrent is corrupt, or just incorrectly encoded. The torrent may still download properly, although some file names could be incorrect.
Most torrent creation programs should allow you to repair this torrent, which will ensure it works properly in all BitTorrent applications.
, tai lataa ohjelma jolla voit korjata torrentin.

document.name: GeneralHelp.DonkeyServerList
document.text: Sinun eDonkey palvelin lista on tyhj
There are no servers in your eDonkey server list. You need to download an up to date server list (met file) to connect to ED2K.
You can download a server list from the ed2k setting page, or the discovery services window. (Press F9 to open the discovery services window)

document.name: GeneralHelp.UploadWarning
document.text: Rajoitetut letys paikat saattavat hidastaa latauksia
Several networks Shareaza connects to enforce ratios, limit uploads to clients that do not share, or simply preference uploading to known sharers.

Fortunately, broadband DSL connections are like a two-lane highway: you have separate allocations for upload and download. If your client is properly configured, you should be able to upload at a good rate while retaining full download capacity.
By default, your upload limit is set to about 85% of available upstream bandwidth, while downloads are unlimited. That configuration should give you the fastest possible downloads that are available.

document.name: SearchHelp.BadSearch1
document.text: Ole hyv ja jrjest hakusi uudelleen

This search is poorly formatted, and may not function correctly. Searches should include several terms where possible, and should specify a schema (file type). Furthermore, searches must not be limited to numbers or negative terms only, and you should avoid overly general queries.
Most clients on the network will ignore a search for all MP3 files, for example, because it is not specific enough, and would generate too many results.

document.name: SearchHelp.BadSearch2
document.text: Ole hyv ja jrjest hakusi uudelleen
This search does not contain enough terms to function properly. All searches need a minimum number of valid, alphabetic characters to be able to start.

While common file extensions (and numbers) can be searched for, you must enter other terms as well when creating the search. Punctuation and wildcards are not used in searches, just the text you enter.

document.name: SearchHelp.BadSearch3
document.text: Ole hyv ja jrjest hakusi uudelleen
This search seems to contain only common file extensions, or no searchable words.
If you are having trouble creating searches, keep in mind that it's quite similar to a web search. Specific terms or phrases are best- Unique names, titles and keywords.
General terms cannot be searched for efficiently and may result in poor search performance, as well as high bandwidth use during searches.
Further help is available on the Shareaza web site.

document.name: SearchHelp.AdultSearch
document.text: This search cannot be started
The specified search would probably return a large number of results with adult content, and this has been turned off in the settings. You should either re-phrase the search, or disable the filter.
To disable the filter, go into Tools > Settings > General and uncheck the adult content filter.

document.name: ShareHelp.AlreadyShared
document.text: Already Shared
The folder you have selected is already being shared as part of an existing share.
%s

document.name: ShareHelp.BadShare
document.text: This folder should not be shared
This folder is (or contains) a system folder. Sharing this folder is not recommended, since most of the files in it are of no use to other people.
Folders such as the Windows directory, Program Files, and similar folders do not usually contain files suitable for sharing. Any files of interest would be in sub-folders located
inside
these folders. Please share those instead.
The Shareaza 'incomplete' folder should also not be shared through the library, since attempting to hash downloads in progress may impact on performance.

In the maximum mode the bandwidth won't exceed the specified value. In the average mode it will fluctuate around the value to both sides.
Enter regular expressions in perl syntax.{n}The search keywords can be specified in a form of <n>, where n is number between 1 and 9. If you want to put all keywords each after other, use <_> markup.

This setting has no effect on downloads previously started, also this setting is ignored if the file have the eDonkey hash and the eDonkey network is enabled or if it is a torrent.{n}However this setting isn't ignored if the download is paused.{n}{n}ATTENTION: Use this option only in case of real necessity, if you abuse of the option you may be banned.

Forcing your PC into hub mode may have adverse effects on performance and the P2P network. It is generally better to allow Shareaza to decide whether or not hub mode should be used.

Hub mode does NOT produce better search results, or have any other advantages for you.

Including your downloaded files folder in your library makes it easier to view and organise new downloads, and lets you take advantage of advanced Shareaza features such as download verification and automatic upgrading. Placing downloaded files in your library does not necessarily require you to share them: you can choose whether or not to share files independently.

Command-line options:

-tray : Disable startup splash screen and send application to tray
-nosplash : Disable startup splash screen
-nowarn : Disable alpha (daily builds) version warning dialog
-wait : Wait for other application instance exit

Interface modes:

-basic : Start application in Basic interface mode
-tabbed : Start application in Tabbed interface mode
-windowed : Start application in Windowed interface mode

System options:

-RegServer : Register internal components for everyone
-UnRegServer : Un-register internal components for everyone
-RegServerPerUser : Register internal components for current user
-UnRegServerPerUser : Un-register internal components for current user
Failed to load metadata schemas. Please reinstall application.

Only download and upload to networks which are connected.

Shareaza Remote Access allows you to leave Shareaza running on your PC, and control it remotely using a web browser. You will need to be able to accept incoming connections to use this feature (i.e. properly configured router, etc).

Shareaza is a general-purpose file-sharing application that can access many P2P networks at the same time. On this page you can select which P2P networks you want to connect to, and then adjust specific settings for each network.
The Gnutella2 network is Shareaza's premiere network, offering more features and performance than any other P2P net. Highly recommended.
The eDonkey network is a popular server-based network. While not as feature-rich as Gnutella2, eDonkey has an impressive file collection.
Although the original Gnutella network is less feature-rich than Gnutella2, and has fewer files than eDonkey, it remains a valuable resource.
Search known remote servers in the server cache:
Receive and update server list from the connected server
Download eDonkey server list from the web:
Clear downloaded torrents When the share ratio reaches:
Enable EndGame mode when completing torrents
Tervetuloa Shareazaan! Sinä et ole tällä hetkellä yhteydessä mihinkään p2p verkkoon.
If you haven't used Shareaza or another P2P client before, this QuickStart wizard can help you configure your copy in a few simple steps.
If you're a more advanced user, you can access the full range of Shareaza's options via the Tools menu. Click Exit to close the wizard at any time.
This wizard will assist you to:
Tell Shareaza about your Internet connection
Connect to your choice of P2P networks, and
For optimum performance, Shareaza needs to know a little bit about your connection to the Internet.
Choose the type of your Internet connection:
Do you want to automatically setup port-forwarding by using UPnP?
P2P networks are only as good as the people who use them. All of the content available for download is being shared by another user.
You do not have to share content to use Shareaza, however some software will behave differently to users who are not sharing anything.
Please indicate which folders, if any, you wish to share. Simply click the Add button to add a new folder.
WARNING: Distributing copyrighted works is an offence in most countries.
Shareaza is a much friendlier place when everyone writes a few basic details about themselves.
Shareaza supports a flexible user interface, so you can choose what is most comfortable for you. You can change these options at any time.
Simple, easy to use menus and buttons.{n}Familiar to users of other file sharing programs.
Power mode offers expert users lots of extra commands, windows, etc.{n}It may be a little confusing for new users!
Display simplified download progress bars. (Reduces CPU use)

Shareaza is a general-purpose file-sharing application that can access many P2P networks at the same time. Here you can select which networks you'd like to access. Note that you can always select different networks later.
The Gnutella2 network is Shareaza's premiere network, offering more features and performance than any other P2P net.
The eDonkey network is a popular server-based network. While not as feature-rich as Gnutella2, eDonkey has an impressive file collection.
Although the original Gnutella network is less feature-rich than Gnutella2, and has fewer files than eDonkey, it remains a valuable resource.
Shareaza has detected that you have another eDonkey program installed on your computer. Would you like to import any unfinished downloads into Shareaza?
That's it! Shareaza has been configured to work with your computer.
If you ever need to change your settings, you can re-run this QuickStart wizard by selecting it from the Tools menu.
After closing this wizard by clicking Finish, you can connect to the networks you selected and start searching and downloading content.
Connect to the network when I close this wizard
Connect to the network every time I start Shareaza
Start Shareaza every time Windows starts
Allow others to browse my user profile
Other users browsing your profile and shared files will see your avatar. Custom avatars should be 128x128 pixels, and can be in any supported image file on your PC.
Favourite files are recommended to users who browse your profile. You can create favourite files by adding them to the "Favourites" library folder.

Users are identified by a globally unique identifier and a corresponding public and private key pair. Normally there is no need to generate a new ID, however Shareaza provides this option for advanced users.
Initiate a new connection to host or server:|Browse this user:|Chat to this user:
Downloading any file with Shareaza is easy. Simply type or paste the URL or URI describing the file into the box below and press Enter.
Shareaza can download files from the web (HTTP), and automatically search and download P2P links (Magnet, Gnutella, eDonkey, mP2P).

Shareaza can also download BitTorrent files. A torrent can be described by a .torrent file, or a HTTP link to the .torrent file. To download a torrent HTTP link, paste it in the box above. If you already have a .torrent file, click Open Torrent:
Only show matches which include the _words:
( you can also exclude words with -word )
Gnutella Bootstrap|G1 GWebCache|G2 GWebCache|G1/G2 GWebCache|Server.met URL|DC++ Hub List URL|Blocked

This is a list of folders in your library. You can add and remove folders using the buttons on the left. When you add a new folder it is initially shared with other users, however you can unshare it from the Shareaza library if you wish.

Shareaza is creating a preview of the download:
(copying downloaded chunks to a new preview file)
Did you know Shareaza is a 100% free product?

Shareaza does NOT contain ANY "spyware", "adware" or other bundled software. It does NOT display any advertisements or "popups", ever.{n}{n}If you ever see advertising or "popups" while using Shareaza, be assured that they are NOT coming from this program.
Unfortunately a lot of other software does come with undesirable adware or spyware, so if you see something suspicious you may wish to check your PC with an advertising or spyware removal program.

You should not have had to pay any money to obtain Shareaza. Shareaza can be freely downloaded by anyone from http://shareaza.sourceforge.net/. If you paid someone money for Shareaza, you should demand a full refund immediately.
We hope you have enjoyed using Shareaza so far. We believe it is the best file sharing application around.
Unfortunately, a lot of file sharers don't know what they're missing!
If you know someone who would like Shareaza, whether they're a new user or someone still putting up with an inferior product, why not let them know there is a better alternative?
Chances are they'll be grateful you rescued them!
